description.title: Event relevancy - four subscriptions through unique WE for each, event is relevant to only one
description.purpose:
Account4 deploys the Relevancy contract, calls the method on the contract to emit the CallerIndexedAddress with addr = the useraccount address. The following accounts are used (in this order)
Account 4 - own wallet extension Account 1 - own wallet extension Account 2 - own wallet extension Account 3 - own wallet extension
where each account subscribes to all events on the contract using contract.events.allEvents. The result is that only the subscription made on account 4 sees the event (as expected).
